Literature.Title: New Small-Size Antifungal Peptides: Design, Synthesis and Antifungal Activity
Literature.Author: Garro AD, Garibotto FM, Rodríguez AM, Raimondi M, Zacchino SA, Perczel A, Somlai C, Penke B, Enriz RD

Literature.Title: New short cationic antibacterial peptides. Synthesis, biological activity and mechanism of action.
Literature.Author: Lima B, Ricci M, Garro AD, Juhász T, Szigyártó IC, Papp ZI, Feresin G, Garcia de la Torre J, Cascales JL, Fülöp L, Beke-Somfai T, Enriz RD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=50µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 32264(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=>50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MBC=25-50µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica(MIC=25µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica(MBC=50µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MBC=25µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MIC=25µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MBC=50µg/ml)
